generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
generations.text: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world. You can get more information about any languages you're interested in, learn new words and phrases, and get help from people in other cultures.

generations.text: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world. You can get help finding a language to learn, or to learn from someone else who has learned the language. LangLang is also an app that provides tips and advice about learning a new language.
